scripts.export-android: mkdir -p android/output && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/output/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/output
scripts.export-ios: mkdir -p ios/output && react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/output/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios/output
scripts.bundle:android:dev: react-native bundle --platform android --dev true --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.bundle:android:prod: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.ota:deploy:dev: npm run ota:export:dev && git add android/output/index.android.bundle && git commit -m 'Deploy OTA update to development' && git push origin development
scripts.ota:deploy:prod: npm run ota:export:prod && git add android/output/index.android.bundle && git commit -m 'Deploy OTA update to production' && git push origin production
